Content: The tattoo team of the Corps of Sri Lanka Military Police (SLCMP) at the request of the authorities in the Ministry of Women’s & Children’s Affairs contributed to the commemoration of the World Children’s Day, held at Colombo Vihara Mahadevi Park on Thursday (5). Sri Lanka Rupavahini Corporation organized the events in cooperation with the Ministry, Colombo Municipal Council and other civil organizations. The Army’s display of acrobatics and drills attracted the huge crowd attending the occasion.
